rules.description: Change Caps Lock to Meh when held

manipulators.description: Run shell command: osascript -e "set volume output volume 100"
Run shell command: osascript -e "set volume output volume 10"
Run shell command: osascript -e "set volume output volume 20"
Run shell command: osascript -e "set volume output volume 30"
Run shell command: osascript -e "set volume output volume 40"
Run shell command: osascript -e "set volume output volume 50"
Run shell command: osascript -e "set volume output volume 60"
Run shell command: osascript -e "set volume output volume 70"
Run shell command: osascript -e "set volume output volume 80"
Run shell command: osascript -e "set volume output volume 90"
